original_text:
For behold, the Lord commands,
    and the great house shall be struck down into fragments,
    and the little house into bits.
korean_text: 보라 여호와께서 명령하시므로 타격을 받아 큰 집은 갈라지고 작은 집은 터지리라

sentences.original_text: and the great house shall be struck down into fragments,
and the little house into bits.
